text: Mirzapur Ganesh Chandra Sikshaniketan is a co-educational Higher Secondary school situated at Mirzapur village in Kulpi, South 24 Parganas in the Indian state of West Bengal. ==History== The school was established as an upper- primary school in 1966 and it was upgraded to secondary school in 2005. Later it was upgraded to higher secondary school in the year 2012. ==HS Section== The Arts stream including History, Geography, Education, Sanskrit, Philosophy has been taught here in higher secondary section. The school is under the affiliation of West Bengal Board of Secondary Education and West Bengal Council of Higher Secondary Education administered by School Education Department. ==References== Category:High schools and secondary schools in West Bengal Category:Schools in South 24 Parganas district Category:Educational institutions established in 1966
title: Mirzapur Ganesh Chandra Sikshaniketan
